column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I came here for my sister's rehearsal dinner
column3: what a great Chicago place to bring out-of-towners!  The bottomless Sangria was A-mazing; I had never had white sangria
column4: but theirs was superb.  The food was very good too.  As with many tapas places
column5: the small dishes were quite carb (bread/potato) heavy with lots of garlic
